statements: DELETE FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE potassium < 10 AND phosphorus > 5;
DELETE FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE id = 1 AND pH < 6.5;
DELETE FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE nitrogen > 20 OR phosphorus < 10;
DELETE FROM soil_samples WHERE pH_level > 7.0 AND moisture_level < 0.5;
DELETE FROM SoilMoisture WHERE moisture_level > 5.0 AND measurement_date < '2022-06-30'
DELETE FROM soil_health_index WHERE parameter1 = 5.0 AND parameter2 = 7.0;
DELETE FROM crop_data WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' AND crop_yield < 1000;
